name: TabsPanel
description:
A panel displayed when the corresponding tab is active.
Renders a `<div>` element.

value.description: The value of the TabPanel. It will be shown when the Tab with the corresponding value is active.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

keepMounted.description: Whether to keep the HTML element in the DOM while the panel is hidden.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
render.detailedType:
| ReactElement
| ((
    props: HTMLProps,
    state: Tabs.Panel.State,
  ) => ReactElement)

data-orientation.description: Indicates the orientation of the tabs.

data-activation-direction.description: Indicates the direction of the activation (based on the previous active tab).

data-hidden.description: Present when the panel is hidden.

data-index.description: Indicates the index of the tab panel.

data-starting-style.description: Present when the panel is animating in.

data-ending-style.description: Present when the panel is animating out.
